bgu.dcr.az.api.agt

Class SendMediator

  • java.lang.Object
    • bgu.dcr.az.api.agt.SendMediator

  • public class SendMediator
extends java.lang.Object
    a middle way object used to send a message you should never directly create an instance of this class the usage of this class should be through the method send of simple agent - simpleAgent.send("Message", arg1,...,argn).to(recipient);
